institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 22 (Use of Training Facility Costs)
contents: Article 22 (Use of Training Facility Costs) Among the training facilities and equipment supported by the Joint Training Center in accordance with Annex 1 of the Regulations, 「Contents of Support for Joint Training Centers」, the costs related to training facilities (including rental deposits) are pursuant to Annex 1 of the Rules, 「Contents of Support for Joint Training Centers」. It must be used for purposes directly related to the consortium project in accordance with the “Detailed Standards for Support for Training Centers, etc.”
